Mysterious Riddle.name: Mysterious Riddle
Mysterious Riddle.question: I'm taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
hints: Think about common items taken from a mine and enclosed in a wooden case.

Word Jumble.name: Word Jumble
Word Jumble.question: Unscramble the letters: L I V R E V E S I
hints: Try rearranging the letters to form a common metal.

Inventory Challenge.name: Inventory Challenge
Inventory Challenge.question: You need to find specific items (a key, a beamsaber, and a blaster) in your inventory to escape the room. Check your inventory to see if you have these items.
hints: Examine your inventory to see if you already have these essential items.
